document_data.name: Belevan Crell
document_data.mainbody: '''Belevan Crell''', who was also later called '''Belevan the Unliving''', was a [[Nentyarch]] of [[Narfell]] during the time of the [[Crell Dynasty]].
document_data.Activities: Belevan ruled from {{Yearlink|-843}} to {{Yearlink|-633}}, far longer than any of his predecessors thanks to his successful transformation into a [[lich]]. Belevan's rule, and that of the entire Crell Dynasty, came to an end in -633 DR when he was overthrown by [[Ulthas Orgolath|Ulthas]] and [[Ulthar Orgolath]], a pair of brothers known as the "Demon Twins."
document_data.Relationships: Belevan was the son and sole heir of the previous Nentyarch, [[Arthauld Crell]]. He was born during the first year of Arthauld's reign in the {{Yearlink|-891}}.
